Comment: Nice, man. This is a good reminder for me to add it to my watch list and check it out soon.

That clown seemed familiar, so I checked and the movie Netflix keeps recommending to me called "Terrifier" must be part 3 or a related spin-off. There are a lot of decent to good horror flicks out there, but it all comes down to having access and being in the mood. If you're looking, I can recommend everything on this list I made, and/or if you end up seeing the sequel, I'd be interested in hearing what you think.
